TextLibrary.Text: We've come from the Jahrwox System. We would greatly appreciate an audience with a Quesadan High Priest.
We've come from the Jahrwox System. We would greatly appreciate an audience with a Quesadan High Priest.
Greetings, travelers, our High Priests have just begun their meditation. They will be available to assist you in two Earth months.
Greetings, travelers, our High Priests have just begun their meditation. They will be available to assist you in two Earth months.
We didn't mean to disturb your Order, however, it is of an urgent nature.
We didn't mean to disturb your Order, however, it is of an urgent nature.
I am sorry, travelers, as I said, the High Priests will be available in two Earth months.
I am sorry, travelers, as I said, the High Priests will be available in two Earth months.
We need to get their attention, kid. Priests, criminals, politicians... it doesn't make any difference. Offer them something and see if it gets their attention.
We need to get their attention, kid. Priests, criminals, politicians... it doesn't make any difference. Offer them something and see if it gets their attention.
